description: revert_resize is like a resize... it's just that it's back to original size.  We need to send a usage event in this case.
title: revert_resize should send usage event

comments.content: revert_resize is like a resize... it's just that it's back to original size.  We need to send a usage event in this case.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/14886

Branch:    master

commit f46911966d69bf64065270f4e7e1049e7bbe05c4
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Oct 26 07:39:11 2012 -0700

    Send usage event on revert_resize
    
    We send a usage event when we resize.  revert_resize should also send
    one to note a resize back to the original size.
    
    Fixes bug 1071773
    
    Change-Id: I96a14ef60fbfa98c75381c7251a217c3e65334ce
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
